Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hello, I need help because my campaign was rejected and I need to understand why.

Hi there! I'm sorry to hear your campaign was rejected. Ad rejection reasons can vary, such as incorrect conversion tracking setup or typographical errors. You should have received an email from Ad Support with the subject line ‘Urgent: Ad Rejected - Action Required,’ which details the specific reason for rejection. Please review that email carefully and address the issue mentioned. If you believe your ad complies with the policies or if the rejection was a misunderstanding, you can submit an appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com. For more detailed guidance, check out this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). Let me know if you need further assistance!

It looks like you might be seeing a warning about having no active ad sets. This could happen if your ad sets are paused or not yet launched. Make sure to check the status of your ad sets in the Ad Manager and ensure they are set to active. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
